author: Phoebe
quote: (entering) Hi guys!

author: All
quote: Hey, Pheebs! Hi!

author: Ross
quote: Hey. Oh, oh, how'd it go?

author: Phoebe
quote: Um, not so good. He walked me to the subway and said 'We should do this again!'

author: All
quote: Ohh. Ouch.

author: Rachel
quote: What? He said 'we should do it again', that's good, right?

author: Monica
quote: Uh, no. Loosely translated 'We should do this again' means 'You will never see me naked'.

author: Rachel
quote: Since when?

author: Joey
quote: Since always. It's like dating language. Y'know, like 'It's not you' means 'It is you'.

author: Chandler
quote: Or 'You're such a nice guy' means 'I'm gonna be dating leather-wearing alcoholics and complaining about them to you'.

author: Phoebe
quote: Or, or, y'know, um, 'I think we should see other people' means 'Ha, ha, I already am'.

author: Rachel
quote: And everybody knows this?

author: Joey
quote: Yeah. Cushions the blow.

author: Chandler
quote: Yeah, it's like when you're a kid, and your parents put your dog to sleep, and they tell you it went off to live on some farm.

author: Ross
quote: That's funny, that, no, because, uh, our parents actually did, uh, send our dog off to live on a farm.

author: Monica
quote: Uh, Ross.

author: Ross
quote: What? Wh- hello? The Millners' farm in Connecticut? The Millners, they had this unbelievable farm, they had horses, and, and rabbits that he could chase and it was- it w- .....Oh my God, Chi Chi!

author: Chandler
quote: "So how does it feel knowing you're about to die?"

author: Joey
quote: "Warden, in five minutes my pain will be over. But you'll have to live with the knowledge that you sent an honest man to die."

author: Chandler
quote: Hey, that was really good!

author: Joey
quote: Thanks! Let's keep going.

author: Chandler
quote: Okay. "So. Whaddya want from me, Damone, huh?"

author: Joey
quote: "I just wanna go back to my cell. 'Cause in my cell, I can smoke."

author: Chandler
quote: "Smoke away."

author: Chandler
quote: I think this is probably why Damone smokes in his cell alone.

author: Joey
quote: What?

author: Chandler
quote: Relax your hand!

author: Chandler
quote: Not so much!

author: Joey
quote: Whoah!

author: Chandler
quote: Hey!

author: Joey
quote: Hey!

author: Chandler
quote: Alright, now try taking a puff.

author: Chandler
quote: Alright.. okay. No. Give it to me.

author: Joey
quote: No no no, I am not giving you a cigarette.

author: Chandler
quote: It's fine, it's fine. Look, do you wanna get this part, or not? Here.

author: Chandler
quote: Don't think of it as a cigarette. Think of it as the thing that's been missing from your hand. When you're holding it, you feel right. You feel complete.

author: Joey
quote: Y'miss it?

author: Chandler
quote: Nah, not so much. Alright, now we smoke. (Takes a puff.) Oh.. my.. God. (He continues to smoke.)

author: Monica
quote: No, no, no. They say it's the same as the distance from the tip of a guy's thumb to the tip of his index finger.

author: Joey
quote: That's ridiculous!

author: Ross
quote: Can I use.. either thumb?

author: Rachel
quote: (carrying a tray of drinks) Alright, don't tell me, don't tell me! (Starts handing them out.) Decaf cappucino for Joey.. Coffee black.. Late.. And an iced tea. I'm getting pretty good at this!

author: All
quote: Yeah. Yeah, excellent.

author: Rachel
quote: (leaving to serve others) Good for me!

author: Joey
quote: Y'okay, Phoebe?

author: Phoebe
quote: Yeah- no- I'm just- it's, I haven't worked- It's my bank.

author: Monica
quote: What did they do to you?

author: Phoebe
quote: It's nothing, it's just- Okay. I'm going through my mail, and I open up their monthly, you know, STATEMENT-

author: Ross
quote: Easy.

author: Phoebe
quote: - and there's five hundred extra dollars in my account.

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, Satan's minions at work again...

author: Phoebe
quote: Yes, 'cause now I have to go down there, and deal with them.

author: Joey
quote: What are you talking about? Keep it!

author: Phoebe
quote: It's not mine, I didn't earn it, if I kept it, it would be like stealing.

author: Rachel
quote: Yeah, but if you spent it, it would be like shopping!

author: Phoebe
quote: Okay. Okay, let's say I bought a really great pair of shoes. Do you know what I'd hear, with every step I took? 'Not-mine. Not-mine. Not-mine.' And even if I was happy, okay, and, and skipping- 'Not-not-mine, not-not-mine, not-not-mine, not-not-mine'...

author: Monica
quote: We're with you. We got it.

author: Phoebe
quote: Okay. I'd- just- I'd never be able to enjoy it. It would be like this giant karmic debt.

author: Rachel
quote: Chandler, what are you doing?

author: Monica
quote: (puling him up) Hey. Whaddya doing?

author: All
quote: Oh! Oh, God!

author: Ross
quote: What is this?!

author: Chandler
quote: I'm smoking. I'm smoking, I'm smoking.

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, I can't believe you! You've been so good, for three years!

author: Chandler
quote: And this- is my reward!

author: Ross
quote: Hold on a second, alright? Just think about what you went through the last time you quit.

author: Chandler
quote: Okay, so this time I won't quit!

author: All
quote: Ohhh! Put it out!

author: Chandler
quote: All right! I'm putting it out, I'm putting it out. (He drops it in Phoebe's coffee.)

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, no! I- I can't drink this now!

author: Monica
quote: Alright. I'm gonna go change, I've got a date.

author: Rachel
quote: This Alan again? How's it goin'?

author: Monica
quote: 'S'going pretty good, y'know? It's nice, and, we're having fun.

author: Joey
quote: So when do we get to meet the guy?

author: Monica
quote: Let's see, today's Monday... Never.

author: All
quote: Oh, come on! Come on!

author: Monica
quote: No. Not after what happened with Steve.

author: Chandler
quote: What are you talking about? We love Schhteve! Schhteve was schhexy!.. Sorry.

author: Monica
quote: Look, I don't even know how I feel about him yet. Just give me a chance to figure that out.

author: Rachel
quote: Well, then can we meet him?

author: Monica
quote: Nope. Schhorry.

author: Monica
quote: I mean, why should I let them meet him? I mean, I bring a guy home, and within five minutes they're all over him. I mean, they're like- coyotes, picking off the weak members of the herd.

author: Paula
quote: Listen. As someone who's seen more than her fair share of bad beef, I'll tell you: that is not such a terrible thing. I mean, they're your friends, they're just looking out after you.

author: Monica
quote: I know. I just wish that once, I'd bring a guy home that they actually liked.

author: Paula
quote: Well, you do realise the odds of that happening are a little slimmer if they never get to meet the guy..

author: Joey
quote: Let it go, Ross.

author: Ross
quote: Yeah, well, you didn't know Chi Chi.

author: Monica
quote: Do you all promise?

author: All
quote: Yeah! We promise! We'll be good!

author: Monica
quote: (shouts to Chandler) Chandler? Do you promise to be good?

author: Joey
quote: You can come in, but your filter-tipped little buddy has to stay outside!

author: Ross
quote: Hey, Pheebs.

author: Phoebe
quote: 'Dear Ms. Buffay. Thank you for calling attention to our error. We have credited your account with five hundred dollars. We're sorry for the inconvenience, and hope you'll accept this- (Searches in her purse) -football phone as our free gift.' Do you believe this?! Now I have a thousand dollars, and a football phone!

author: Rachel
quote: What bank is this?

author: Monica
quote: Hey. It's him. (On the intercom) Who is it?

author: Alan
quote: (on the intercom) It's Alan.

author: Joey
quote: (shouting to Chandler) Chandler! He's here!

author: Monica
quote: (to all) Okay, please be good, please. Just remember how much you all like me.

author: Monica
quote: Hi. Alan, this is everybody. Everybody, this is Alan.

author: Alan
quote: Hi.

author: All
quote: Hi, Alan.

author: Alan
quote: I've heard schho much about all you guyschh!

author: Monica
quote: (to Alan) Thanks. I'll call you tomorrow. (Alan exits, to all) Okay. Okay, let's let the Alan-bashing begin. Who's gonna take the first shot, hmm?

author: Monica
quote: C'mon!

author: Ross
quote: ...I'll go. Let's start with the way he kept picking at- no, I'm sorry, I can't do this, can't do this. We loved him.

author: All
quote: Loved him! Yeah! He's great!

author: Monica
quote: Wait a minute! We're talking about someone that I'm going out with?

author: All
quote: Yeah!

author: Rachel
quote: And did you notice...? (She spreads her thumb and index finger.)

author: The Guys
quote: (reluctantly) Yeah.

author: Joey
quote: Know what was great? The way his smile was kinda crooked.

author: Phoebe
quote: Yes, yes! Like the man in the shoe!

author: Ross
quote: ...What shoe?

author: Phoebe
quote: From the nursery rhyme. 'There was a crooked man, Who had a crooked smile, Who lived in a shoe, For a... while...'

author: Ross
quote: ...So I think Alan will become the yardstick against which all future boyfriends will be measured.

author: Rachel
quote: What future boyfriends? Nono, I th- I think this could be, y'know, it.

author: Monica
quote: Really!

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, yeah. I'd marry him just for his David Hasselhof impression alone. You know I'm gonna be doing that at parties, right? (Does the impression)

author: Ross
quote: You know what I like most about him, though?

author: All
quote: What?

author: Ross
quote: The way he makes me feel about myself.

author: All
quote: Yeah...

author: Monica
quote: Hi.. how was the game?

author: Ross
quote: Well..

author: All
quote: WE WON!! Thank you! Yes!

author: Monica
quote: Fantastic! I have one question: How is that possible?

author: Joey
quote: Alan.

author: Ross
quote: He was unbelievable. He was like that-that-that Bugs Bunny cartoon where Bugs is playing all the positions, right, but instead of Bugs it was first base-Alan, second base-Alan, third base-...

author: Rachel
quote: I mean, it-it was like, it was like he made us into a team.

author: Chandler
quote: Yep, we sure showed those Hassidic jewellers a thing or two about softball..

author: Monica
quote: Can I ask you guys a question? D'you ever think that Alan is maybe.. sometimes..

author: Ross
quote: What?

author: Monica
quote: ..I dunno, a little too Alan?

author: Rachel
quote: Well, no. That's impossible. You can never be too Alan.

author: Ross
quote: Yeah, it's his, uh, innate Alan-ness that-that-that we adore.

author: Chandler
quote: I personally could have a gallon of Alan.

author: Phoebe
quote: Hey, Lizzie.

author: Lizzie
quote: Hey, Weird Girl.

author: Phoebe
quote: I brought you alphabet soup.

author: Lizzie
quote: Did you pick out the vowels?

author: Phoebe
quote: Yes. But I left in the Ys. 'Cause, y'know, "sometimes y". Uh, I also have something else for you. (She searches in her purse.)

author: Lizzie
quote: Saltines?

author: Phoebe
quote: No, but would you like a thousand dollars and a football phone?

author: Lizzie
quote: What? (She opens the envelope Phoebe has given her.) Oh my God, there's really money in here.

author: Phoebe
quote: I know.

author: Lizzie
quote: Weird Girl, what are you doing?

author: Phoebe
quote: No, I want you to have it. I don't want it.

author: Lizzie
quote: No, no, I ha-I have to give you something.

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, that's fine, no.

author: Lizzie
quote: Would you like my tin-foil hat?

author: Phoebe
quote: No. 'Cause you need that. No, it's okay, thanks.

author: Lizzie
quote: Please, let me do something.

author: Phoebe
quote: Okay, alright, you buy me a soda, and then we're even. Okay?

author: Lizzie
quote: Okay.

author: Phoebe
quote: Okay.

author: Lizzie
quote: Keep the change. (To Phoebe) Sure you don't wanna pretzel?

author: Phoebe
quote: No, I'm fine.

author: Lizzie
quote: (leaves) See ya.

author: Phoebe
quote: Huh!

author: Ross
quote: A thumb?!

author: All
quote: Eww!

author: Phoebe
quote: I know! I know, I opened it up and there it was, just floating in there, like this tiny little hitch-hiker!

author: Chandler
quote: Well, maybe it's a contest, y'know? Like, collect all five?

author: Phoebe
quote: Does, um, anyone wanna see?

author: All
quote: Nooo!

author: All
quote: Oh, hey, don't do that! Cut it out!

author: Rachel
quote: It's worse than the thumb!

author: Chandler
quote: Hey, this is so unfair!

author: Monica
quote: Oh, why is it unfair?

author: Chandler
quote: So I have a flaw! Big deal! Like Joey's constant knuckle-cracking isn't annoying? And Ross, with his over-pronouncing every single word? And Monica, with that snort when she laughs? I mean, what the hell is that thing? ...I accept all those flaws, why can't you accept me for this?

author: Joey
quote: ...Does the knuckle-cracking bother everybody?

author: Rachel
quote: Well, I-I could live without it.

author: Joey
quote: Well, is it, like, a little annoying, or is it like when Phoebe chews her hair?

author: Ross
quote: Oh, now, don't listen to him, Pheebs, I think it's endearing.

author: Joey
quote: Oh, (Imitating Ross) "you do, do you"?

author: Ross
quote: You know, there's nothing wrong with speaking correctly.

author: Rachel
quote: "Indeed there isn't"... I should really get back to work.

author: Phoebe
quote: Yeah, 'cause otherwise someone might get what they actually ordered.

author: Rachel
quote: Ohh-ho-hooohhh. The hair comes out, and the gloves come on.

author: Monica
quote: Did you ever go out with a guy your friends all really like?

author: Paula
quote: No.

author: Monica
quote: Okay.. Well, I'm going out with a guy my friends all really like.

author: Paula
quote: Waitwait.. we talking about the coyotes here? All right, a cow got through!

author: Monica
quote: Can you believe it? ...Y'know what? I just don't feel the thing. I mean, they feel the thing, I don't feel the thing.

author: Paula
quote: Honey.. you should always feel the thing. Listen, if that's how you feel about the guy, Monica, dump him!

author: Monica
quote: I know.. it's gonna be really hard.

author: Paula
quote: Well, he's a big boy, he'll get over it.

author: Monica
quote: No, he'll be fine. It's the other five I'm worried about.

author: Joey
quote: Do you have any respect for your body?

author: Ross
quote: Don't you realise what you're-you're doing to yourself?

author: Chandler
quote: Hey, y'know, I have had it with you guys and your cancer and your emphysema and your heart disease. The bottom line is, smoking is cool, and you know it.

author: Rachel
quote: (holding the phone out to Chandler) Chandler? It's Alan, he wants to speak to you.

author: Chandler
quote: Really? He does? (taking the phone) Hey, buddy, what's up! Oh, she told you about that, huh. Well, yeah, I have one now and then. Well, yeah, now. Well, it's not that big- ..well, that's true,.. Gee, y'know, no-one- no-one's ever put it like that before. Well, okay, thanks! (He hands the phone back and stubs out his cigarette.)

author: Rachel
quote: (to Ross, who has wandered up) God, he's good.

author: Ross
quote: If only he were a woman.

author: Rachel
quote: Yeah.

author: Chandler
quote: Ooh, Lambchop. How old is that sock? If I had a sock on my hand for thirty years it'd be talking too.

author: Ross
quote: Okay. I think it's time to change somebody's nicotine patch. (Does so.)

author: Monica
quote: (entering) Hey. Where's Joey?

author: Chandler
quote: Joey ate my last stick of gum, so I killed him. Do you think that was wrong?

author: Rachel
quote: I think he's across the hall.

author: Monica
quote: Thanks. (Goes to fetch him.)

author: Ross
quote: (finishing changing Chandler's nicotine patch) There y'go.

author: Chandler
quote: (deadpan) Ooh, I'm alive with pleasure now.

author: Ross
quote: Hey Pheebs, you gonna have the rest of that Pop-Tart?.. Pheebs?

author: Phoebe
quote: Does anyone want the rest of this Pop-Tart?

author: Ross
quote: Hey, I might!

author: Phoebe
quote: Sorry. ..Y'know, those stupid soda people gave me seven thousand dollars for the thumb.

author: All
quote: You're kidding. Oh my God.

author: Phoebe
quote: And on my way over here, I stepped in gum. ...What is up with the universe?!

author: Joey
quote: (dragged in by Monica, he has just gotten out of the shower) What's going on?

author: Monica
quote: Nothing. I just think it's nice when we're all here together.

author: Joey
quote: Even nicer when everyone gets to wear their underwear..

author: Rachel
quote: Uh, Joey..

author: Joey
quote: Oh, God! (Hurriedly closes his legs.)

author: Monica
quote: (turns off the TV) Okay..

author: All
quote: Oh! That was Lambchop!

author: Monica
quote: Please, guys, we have to talk.

author: Phoebe
quote: Wait, wait, I'm getting a deja vu...no, I'm not.

author: Monica
quote: Alright, we have to talk.

author: Phoebe
quote: There it is!

author: Monica
quote: Okay. It's-it's about Alan. There's something that you should know. I mean, there's really no easy way to say this.. uh.. I've decided to break up with Alan.

author: Ross
quote: Is there somebody else?

author: Monica
quote: No, nononono.. it's just.. things change. People change.

author: Rachel
quote: We didn't change..

author: Joey
quote: So that's it? It's over? Just like that?

author: Phoebe
quote: You know.. you let your guard down, you start to really care about someone, and I just- I- (starts chewing her hair)

author: Monica
quote: Look, I- I could go on pretending-

author: Joey
quote: Okay!

author: Monica
quote: -but that wouldn't be fair to me, it wouldn't be fair to Alan- It wouldn't be fair to you!

author: Ross
quote: Who-who wants fair? Y'know, I just want things back. Y'know, the way they were.

author: Monica
quote: I'm sorry..

author: Chandler
quote: (sarcastic) Oh, she's sorry! I feel better!

author: Rachel
quote: (tearful) I just can't believe this! I mean, with the holidays coming up- I wanted him to meet my family-

author: Monica
quote: I'll meet somone else. There'll be other Alans.

author: All
quote: Oh, yeah! Right!

author: Monica
quote: Are you guys gonna be okay?

author: Ross
quote: Hey hey, we'll be fine. We're just gonna need a little time.

author: Monica
quote: (dubious) I understand.

author: Alan
quote: Wow.

author: Monica
quote: I'm, I'm really sorry.

author: Alan
quote: Yeah, I'm sorry too. But, I gotta tell you, I am a little relieved.

author: Monica
quote: Relieved?

author: Alan
quote: Yeah, well, I had a great time with you.. I just can't stand your friends.

author: Rachel
quote: Remember when we went to Central Park and rented boats?.. That was fun.

author: Ross
quote: Yeah. He could row like a viking.

author: Monica
quote: (entering) Hi.

author: All
quote: Mmm.

author: Ross
quote: So how'd it go?

author: Monica
quote: Oh, y'know..

author: Phoebe
quote: Did he mention us?

author: Monica
quote: He said he's really gonna miss you guys. (dubious look)

author: Ross
quote: You had a rough day, huh.. c'mere. (She sits down and Ross strokes her forehead.)

author: Chandler
quote: ...That's it. I'm getting cigarettes.

author: All
quote: No no no!

author: Chandler
quote: (leaving) I don't care, I don't care! Game's over! I'm weak! I've gotta smoke! I've gotta have the smoke!

author: Phoebe
quote: (shouting as he leaves) If you never smoke again I'll give you seven thousand dollars!

author: Chandler
quote: (returns) Yeah, alright.

author: Rachel
quote: Everybody? Shh, shhh. Uhhh... Central Perk is proud to present the music of Miss Phoebe Buffay.

author: Phoebe
quote: Hi. Um, I want to start with a song thats about that moment when you suddenly realize what life is all about. OK, here we go. (plays a chord, then the lights go out) OK, thank you very much.

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, great. This is just...

author: Rachel
quote: Wow, this is so cool, you guys. The entire city is blacked out!

author: Monica
quote: Mom says it's all of Manhattan, parts of Brooklyn and Queens, and they have no idea when it's coming back on.

author: Rachel
quote: Wow, you guys, this is big.

author: Monica
quote: (into phone) Pants and a sweater? Why, mom? Who am I gonna meet in a blackout? Power company guys? Eligible looters? Could we talk about this later? OK. (hangs up)

author: Phoebe
quote: Can I borrow the phone? I want to call my apartment and check on my grandma. (to Monica) What's my number?

author: Phoebe
quote: Well, I never call me.

author: Chandler
quote: Oh my God, it's that Victoria's Secret model. Something... something Goodacre.

author: Chandler
quote: She's right, it's Jill. Jill Goodacre. Oh my God. I am trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! (pause) Is it a vestibule? Maybe it's an atrium. Oh, yeah, that is the part to focus on, you idiot!

author: Jill
quote: (on phone) Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just stuck at the bank, in an ATM vestibule.

author: Chandler
quote: Jill says vestibule... I'm going with vestibule.

author: Jill
quote: (on phone) I'm fine. No, I'm not alone... I don't know, some guy.

author: Chandler
quote: Oh! Some guy. Some guy. 'Hey Jill, I saw you with some guy last night. Yes, he was some guy.

author: Joey
quote: Hi everyone.

author: Ross
quote: And officiating at tonight's blackout, is Rabbi Tribbiani.

author: Joey
quote: Well, Chandler's old roomate was Jewish, and these are the only candles we have, so... Happy Chanukah, everyone.

author: Phoebe
quote: (at window) Eww, look. Ugly Naked Guy lit a bunch of candles.

author: Rachel
quote: That had to hurt!

author: Chandler
quote: Alright, alright, alright. It's been fourteen and a half minutes and you still have not said one word. Oh God, do something. Just make contact, smile!

author: Chandler
quote: There you go!

author: Chandler
quote: You're definitely scaring here.

author: Jill
quote: (awkwardly) Would you like to call somebody? (offering phone)

author: Chandler
quote: Yeah, about 300 guys I went to high school with. Yeah, thanks. (takes phone)

author: Monica
quote: Hello?

author: Chandler
quote: Hey, it's me.

author: Monica
quote: (to everyone) It's Chandler! (on phone) Are you OK?

author: Chandler
quote: Yeah, I'm fine. (trying to cover up what he is saying) I'm trppd in an ATM vstbl wth Jll Gdcr.

author: Monica
quote: What?

author: Chandler
quote: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth Jll Gdcr!

author: Monica
quote: I have no idea what you just said.

author: Chandler
quote: (angry) Put Joey on the phone.

author: Joey
quote: What's up man?

author: Chandler
quote: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth JLL GDCR.

author: Joey
quote: (to everyone) Oh my God! He's trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! (on phone) Chandler, listen. (says something intentionally garbled)

author: Chandler
quote: Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind.

author: Rachel
quote: Alright, somebody.

author: Monica
quote: OK, I'll go. OK, senior year of college... on a pool table.

author: All
quote: Whoooaa!

author: Ross
quote: That's my sister.

author: Joey
quote: OK... my weirdest place would have to be... the women's room on the second floor of the New York CIty public library.

author: Monica
quote: Oh my God! What were you doing in a library?

author: Ross
quote: Pheebs, what about you?

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh... Milwaukee.

author: Rachel
quote: Um... Ross?

author: Ross
quote: Disneyland, 1989, 'It's a Small World After All.'

author: All
quote: No way!

author: Ross
quote: The ride broke down. So, Carol and I went behind a couple of those mechanical Dutch children... then they fixed the ride, and we were asked never to return to the Magic Kingdom.

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, Rachel.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh come on, I already went.

author: Monica
quote: You did not go!

author: All
quote: Come on.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, alright. The weirdest place would have to be... (sigh)... oh, the foot of the bed.

author: Ross
quote: Step back.

author: Joey
quote: We have a winner!

author: Rachel
quote: I just never had a relationship with that kind of passion, you know, where you have to have somebody right there, in the middle of a theme park.

author: Ross
quote: Well, it was the only thing to do there that didn't have a line.

author: Rachel
quote: There, well, see? Barry wouldn't even kiss me on a miniature golf course.

author: Ross
quote: Come on.

author: Rachel
quote: No, he said we were holding up the people behind us.

author: Ross
quote: (sarcastically) And you didn't marry him because...?

author: Rachel
quote: I mean, do you think there are people who go through life never having that kind of...

author: Ross
quote: Probably. But you know, I'll tell you something. Passion is way overrated.

author: Rachel
quote: Yeah right.

author: Ross
quote: It is. Eventually, it kind of... burns out. But hopefully, what you're left with is trust, and security, and... well, in the case of my ex-wife, lesbianism. So, you know, for all of those people who miss out on that passion... thing, there's all that other good stuff.

author: Rachel
quote: (sigh) OK.

author: Ross
quote: But, um... I don't think that's going to be you.

author: Rachel
quote: You don't.

author: Ross
quote: Uh-uh. See, I see.... big passion in your future.

author: Rachel
quote: Really?

author: Ross
quote: Mmmm.

author: Rachel
quote: You do?

author: Ross
quote: I do.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh Ross, you're so great. (she playfully rubs his head and gets up)

author: Joey
quote: It's never gonna happen.

author: Ross
quote: (innocently) What?

author: Joey
quote: You and Rachel.

author: Ross
quote: (acts surprised) What? (pause) Why not?

author: Joey
quote: Because you waited too long to make your move, and now you're in the friend zone.

author: Ross
quote: No, no, no. I'm not in the zone.

author: Joey
quote: Ross, you're mayor of the zone.

author: Ross
quote: I'm taking my time, alright? I'm laying the groundwork. Yeah. I mean, every day I get just a little bit closer to...

author: Joey
quote: Priesthood! Look Ross, I'm telling you, she has no idea what you're thinking. If you don't ask her out soon you're going to end up stuck in the zone forever.

author: Ross
quote: I will, I will. See, I'm waiting for the right moment. (Joey looks at him) What? What, now?

author: Joey
quote: Yeeeeaaaahhh! What's messing you up? The wine? The candles? The moonlight? You've just got to go up to her and say, 'Rachel, I think that...' (Rachel comes into the room behind them)

author: Ross
quote: Shhhh!

author: Rachel
quote: What are you shushing?

author: Ross
quote: We're shushing... because... we're trying to hear something. Listen. (everyone is silent) Don't you hear that?

author: Rachel
quote: Ahhhh!

author: Ross
quote: See?

author: Rachel
quote: Huh. (she agrees, but looks very confused)

author: Jill
quote: Would you like some gum?

author: Chandler
quote: Um, is it sugarless?

author: Jill
quote: (checks) Sorry, it's not.

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, then no thanks. What the hell was that? Mental note: If Jill Goodacre offers you gum, you take it. If she offers you mangled animal carcass, you take it.

author: Phoebe
quote: (singing) New York City has no power, and the milk is getting sour. But to me it is not scary, 'cause I stay away from dairy.... la la la, la la, la la... (she writes the lyrics down)

author: Ross
quote: (to Joey) OK, here goes.

author: Joey
quote: Are you going to do it?

author: Ross
quote: I'm going to do it.

author: Joey
quote: Do you want any help?

author: Ross
quote: You come out there, you're a dead man.

author: Joey
quote: Good luck, man.

author: Ross
quote: Thanks. (Joey hugs him) OK.

author: Joey
quote: OK. (Ross goes out on the balcony to talk to Rachel)

author: Joey
quote: Hey, where are you going?

author: Monica
quote: Outside.

author: Joey
quote: You can't go out there.

author: Monica
quote: Why not?

author: Joey
quote: Because of... the reason.

author: Monica
quote: And that would be?

author: Joey
quote: I, um, can't tell you.

author: Monica
quote: Joey, what's going on?

author: Joey
quote: OK, you've got to promise that you'll never, ever tell Ross that I told you.

author: Monica
quote: About what?

author: Joey
quote: He's planning your birthday party.

author: Monica
quote: Oh my God! I love him!

author: Joey
quote: (as Phoebe enters) You'd better act surprised.

author: Phoebe
quote: About what?

author: Monica
quote: My surprise party!

author: Phoebe
quote: What surprise party?

author: Monica
quote: Oh stop it. Joey already told me.

author: Phoebe
quote: Well, he didn't tell me.

author: Joey
quote: Hey, don't look at me. This is Ross's thing.

author: Phoebe
quote: This is so typical. I'm always the last one to know everything.

author: Monica
quote: No, you are not. We tell you stuff.

author: Phoebe
quote: Yuh-huh! I was the last one to know when Chandler got bitten by the peacock at the zoo. I was the last one to know when you had a crush on Joey when he was moving in. (Monica gestures at Phoebe to shut up; Joey looks surprised but pleased) Looks like I was second to last.

author: Rachel
quote: Hmmm... this is so nice.

author: Ross
quote: OK, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as.. more of a general wondering... ment.

author: Rachel
quote: OK.

author: Ross
quote: OK. Here goes. For a while now, I've been wanting to, um....

author: Rachel
quote: Ohhh!!!! (looking at something behind Ross)

author: Ross
quote: Yes, yes, that's right...

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, look at the little cat! (a small kitten is on the roof behind Ross)

author: Ross
quote: What? (the cat jumps on his shoulders) Ow!

author: Monica, Joey, and Phoebe
quote: (singing) I'm on top of the world, looking down on creation and the only explanation I can find, is the wonders I've found ever since...

author: Monica
quote: (to Ross) This is just Bactine. It won't hurt.

author: Joey
quote: Sorry, that was wax.

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, poor little Tooty is scared to death. We should find his owner.

author: Ross
quote: Why don't we just put 'poor little Tooty' out in the hall?

author: Rachel
quote: During a blackout? He'd get trampled!

author: Ross
quote: (nonchalantly) Yeah?

author: Chandler
quote: You know, on second thought, gum would be perfection. (Jill gives him a stick of gum, and a strange look) 'Gum would be perfection'? 'Gum would be perfection.' Could have said 'gum would be nice,' or 'I'll have a stick,' but no, no, no, no. For me, gum is perfection. I loathe myself.

author: Phoebe
quote: (stops at a door) Oh no, the Mendels, they hate all living things, right?

author: Rachel
quote: Oh. (they knock at the next door, Mr. Heckles answers) Hi. We just found this cat and we're looking for the owner.

author: Mr. Heckles
quote: Er, yeah, it's mine.

author: Phoebe
quote: (trying to hold back the struggling cat) He seems to hate you. Are you sure?

author: Mr. Heckles
quote: Yeah, it's my cat. Give me my cat.

author: Phoebe
quote: Wait a minute. What's his name?

author: Mr. Heckles
quote: Ehhhh... B-Buttons.

author: Rachel
quote: Bob Buttons?

author: Mr. Heckles
quote: Mmm. Bob Buttons. Here, Bob Buttons.

author: Phoebe
quote: (the cat runs away from her) Oooh! You are a very bad man!

author: Mr. Heckles
quote: (as Phoebe and Rachel leave) You owe me a cat.

author: Rachel
quote: Here, kitty-kitty. Here kitty-kitty. Where did you go, little kitty-kitty-kitty? Here kitty-kitty-kitty-kitty...

author: Paolo
quote: (something Italian)

author: Rachel
quote: Wow. (she exhales in amazement, blowing the candle out)

author: Ross
quote: (rolling) Lucky sixes....

author: Rachel
quote: (entering with Paolo, arm in arm) Everybody, this is Paolo. Paolo, I want you to meet my friends. This is Monica.

author: Monica
quote: (smitten) Hi!

author: Rachel
quote: And Joey....

author: Monica
quote: Hi!

author: Rachel
quote: And Ross.

author: Monica
quote: Hi!

author: Paolo
quote: (something in Italian)

author: Rachel
quote: (proudly) He doesn't speak much English.

author: Paolo
quote: (pointing at game) Monopoly!

author: Rachel
quote: Look at that!

author: Ross
quote: (jealous) So, um... where did Paolo come from?

author: Rachel
quote: Oh... Italy, I think.

author: Ross
quote: No, I mean tonight, in the building. Suddenly. Into our lives.

author: Rachel
quote: Well, the cat... the cat turned out to be Paolo's cat!

author: Ross
quote: That, that is funny... (to Joey).... and Rachel keeps touching him.

author: Phoebe
quote: Alright. I looked all over the building and I couldn't find the kitty anywhere.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, I found him. He was Paolo's cat.

author: Phoebe
quote: Ah! Well! There you go! Last to know again! And I'm guessing... since nobody told me... this is Paolo.

author: Rachel
quote: Ah, Paolo, this is Phoebe.

author: Paolo
quote: (something in Italian, he is apparently attracted to Phoebe)

author: Phoebe
quote: (smiling) You betcha!

author: Chandler
quote: (chewing gum) Ah, let's see. What next? Blow a bubble. A bubble's good. It's got a... boyish charm, it's impish. Here we go.

author: Chandler
quote: Nice going, imp. OK, it's OK. All I need to do is reach over and put it in my mouth. (Chandler slyly grabs the gum from the wall and slides it back in his mouth.)

author: Chandler
quote: Good save! We're back on track, and I'm... (grimacing) ..chewing someone else's gum. This is not my gum. Oh my God! Oh my God! And now you're choking.

author: Jill
quote: Are you alright?

author: Jill
quote: My God, you're choking! (she runs over and gives him the Heimlich, the gum flies from his mouth) That better?

author: Chandler
quote: (gasping) Yes... thank you. That was... that was....

author: Jill
quote: Perfection?

author: Paolo
quote: (something romantic in Italian about Rachel and the stars)

author: Ross
quote: (mocking Paolo) Blah blah blah, blah blah blah... blah blaaaaaah....

author: Ross
quote: Wha-What did he say that was so funny?

author: Rachel
quote: I have absolutely no idea.

author: Ross
quote: That's... that's classic.

author: Rachel
quote: (to Monica and Phoebe) Oh my God, you guys, what am I doing? What am I doing? This is so un-me!

author: Monica
quote: If you want, I'll do it.

author: Phoebe
quote: I know, I just want to bite his bottom lip. (Rachel looks at her) But I won't.

author: Rachel
quote: God, the first time he smiled at me... those three seconds were more exciting than three weeks in Bermuda with Barry.

author: Phoebe
quote: You know, did you ride mopeds? 'Cause I've heard... (they stare at her)... oh, I see... it's not about that right now. OK.

author: Rachel
quote: Y'know, I know it's totally superficial and we have absolutely nothing in common, and we don't even speak the same language but Goooooooddddddd....

author: Ross
quote: Paolo. Hi.

author: Paolo
quote: Ross!

author: Ross
quote: Listen. Um, listen. Something you should... know... um, Rachel and I... we're kind of a thing.

author: Paolo
quote: Thing?

author: Ross
quote: Thing, yes. Thing.

author: Paolo
quote: Ah, you... have the sex?

author: Ross
quote: No, no, no. Technically the... sex is not... being had, but that's... see, that's not the point. See, um, the point is that... Rachel and I should be, er, together. You know, and if you get in the.... um...

author: Paolo
quote: Bed?

author: Ross
quote: No, no, that's not where I was going. Er, if you get in the... way, of us becoming a thing, then I would be, well, very sad.

author: Paolo
quote: Oh!

author: Ross
quote: Yeah! Se vice?

author: Paolo
quote: Si.

author: Ross
quote: So you do know a little English.

author: Paolo
quote: Poco... a leetle.

author: Ross
quote: Do you know the word crapweasel?

author: Paolo
quote: No.

author: Ross
quote: That's funny, because you know, you are a huge crapweasel!

author: Jill
quote: Chandler, we've been here for an hour doing this! Now watch, it's easy.

author: Chandler
quote: OK.

author: Jill
quote: Ready? (she swings the pen around her head in a circle)

author: Jill
quote: No, you've got to whip it.

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, look look look. The last candle's about to burn out. 10, 9, 8, 7... (time lapse)... negative 46, negative 47, negative 48.... (someone blows it out, the room gets completely dark)

author: Ross
quote: Thank you.

author: Phoebe
quote: Thanks.

author: Ross
quote: Kinda... spooky without any lights.

author: Joey
quote: (does a maniacal laugh) Bwah-hah-hah!

author: Ross
quote: OK, guys, guys? I have the definitive one. Mwwwooooo-hah-hah...

author: Ross
quote: Oh.. oh... oh.

author: Joey
quote: Hey Ross. This probably isn't the best time to bring it up, but you have to throw a party for Monica.

author: Jill
quote: Well, this has been fun.

author: Chandler
quote: Yes. Yes, thanks for letting me use your phone... and for saving my life.

author: Jill
quote: Well, goodbye Chandler. I had a great blackout. (she kisses him on the cheek) See ya.

author: Chandler
quote: Hi, um, I'm account number 7143457. And, uh, I don't know if you got any of that, but I would really like a copy of the tape.

author: Monica
quote: What you guys don't understand is, for us, kissing is as important as any part of it.

author: Joey
quote: Yeah, right!.......Y'serious?

author: Phoebe
quote: Oh, yeah!

author: Rachel
quote: Everything you need to know is in that first kiss.

author: Monica
quote: Absolutely.

author: Chandler
quote: Yeah, I think for us, kissing is pretty much like an opening act, y'know? I mean it's like the stand-up comedian you have to sit through before Pink Floyd comes out.

author: Ross
quote: Yeah, and-and it's not that we don't like the comedian, it's that-that... that's not why we bought the ticket.

author: Chandler
quote: The problem is, though, after the concert's over, no matter how great the show was, you girls are always looking for the comedian again, y'know? I mean, we're in the car, we're fighting traffic... basically just trying to stay awake.

author: Rachel
quote: Yeah, well, word of advice: Bring back the comedian. Otherwise next time you're gonna find yourself sitting at home, listening to that album alone.

author: Joey
quote: (pause)....Are we still talking about sex?

author: Ross
quote: No, it's good, it is good, it's just that- mm- doesn't she seem a little angry?

author: Marsha
quote: Well, she has issues.

author: Ross
quote: Does she.

author: Marsha
quote: He's out banging other women over the head with a club, while she sits at home trying to get the mastodon smell out of the carpet!

author: Ross
quote: Marsha, these are cave people. Okay? They have issues like 'Gee, that glacier's getting kinda close.' See?

author: Marsha
quote: Speaking of issues, isn't that your ex-wife?

author: Ross
quote: (trying to ignore her) No. No.

author: Marsha
quote: Yes, it is. Carol! Hi!

author: Ross
quote: Okay, okay, yes, it is. (waves) How about I'll, uh, catch up with you in the Ice Age.

author: Ross
quote: Hi.

author: Carol
quote: So.

author: Ross
quote: You look great. I, uh... I hate that.

author: Carol
quote: Sorry. You look good too.

author: Ross
quote: Ah, well, in here, anyone who... stands erect... So what's new? Still, uh...

author: Carol
quote: A lesbian?

author: Ross
quote: Well... you never know. How's, um.. how's the family?

author: Carol
quote: Marty's still totally paranoid. Oh, and, uh-

author: Ross
quote: Why- why are you here, Carol?

author: Carol
quote: I'm pregnant.

author: Ross
quote: Pregnant?!

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, I think this is the episode of Three's Company where there's some kind of misunderstanding.

author: Phoebe
quote: ...Then I've already seen this one! (Turns off the TV.)

author: Monica
quote: (taking a drink from Joey) Are you through with that?

author: Joey
quote: Yeah, sorry, the swallowing slowed me down.

author: Monica
quote: Whose little ball of paper is this?!

author: Chandler
quote: Oh, uh, that would be mine. See, I wrote a note to myself, and then I realised I didn't need it, so I balled it up and... (sees that Monica is glaring at him) ...now I wish I was dead.

author: Phoebe
quote: She's already fluffed that pillow... Monica, you know, you've already fluffed that- (Monica glares at her.) -but, it's fine!

author: Monica
quote: Look , I'm sorry, guys, I just don't wanna give them any more ammunition than they already have.

author: Chandler
quote: Yes, and we all know how cruel a parent can be about the flatness of a child's pillow.

author: Phoebe
quote: Monica- Hi! Um, Monica, you're scaring me. I mean, you're like, you're like all chaotic and twirly. And not-not in a good way.

author: Joey
quote: Yeah, calm down. You don't see Ross getting all chaotic and twirly every time they come.

author: Monica
quote: That's because as far as my parents are concerned, Ross can do no wrong. Y'see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.

author: Chandler
quote: (looking out the window) Ew, ew, ew, ew ew ew ew ew!

author: Monica
quote: What?

author: Chandler
quote: Ugly Naked Guy got a Thighmaster!

author: All
quote: Eeaagh!

author: Rachel
quote: Has anybody seen my engagement ring?

author: Phoebe
quote: Yeah, it's beautiful.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh God, oh God, oh God oh God oh God oh God.... (Starts to look under the couch cushions.)

author: Phoebe
quote: No, look, don't touch that!

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, like I wasn't dreading tomorrow enough, having to give it back to him... 'Hi Barry! Remember me? I'm the girl in the veil who stomped on your heart in front of your entire family!' Oh God and now I'm gonna have to return the ring, without the ring, which makes it so much harder...

author: Monica
quote: Easy Rach, we'll find it. (To all) Won't we!

author: Chandler and Joey
quote: Oh! Yeah!

author: Joey
quote: Alright, when'd'ya have it on last?

author: Phoebe
quote: Doy! Probably right before she lost it!

author: Chandler
quote: You don't get a lot of 'doy' these days...

author: Rachel
quote: I know I had it this morning, and I know I had it when I was in the kitchen with...

author: Chandler
quote: ...Dinah?

author: Rachel
quote: (looks at the lasagne and realizes something) Ohhhhh, don't be mad...

author: Monica
quote: You didn't.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, I am sorry...

author: Monica
quote: I gave you one job! (Starts to examin the lasagne through the bottom of the glass pan.)

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, but look how straight those noodles are!

author: Chandler
quote: Now, Monica, you know that's not how you look for an engagement ring in a lasagne...

author: Monica
quote: (puts down the lasagne) I just... can't do it.

author: Chandler
quote: Boys? We're going in.

author: Ross
quote: (standing outside the door).....Hi.

author: Monica
quote: Wow. That is not a happy hi.

author: Ross
quote: Carol's pregnant.

author: Phoebe
quote: (while everyone else is stunned) Ooh! I found it!

author: Ross
quote: Yeah. Do that for another two hours, you might be where I am right about now. (He enters.)

author: Chandler
quote: Kinda puts that whole pillow thing in perspective, huh, Mon?

author: Rachel
quote: Well now, how-how do you fit into this whole thing?

author: Ross
quote: Well, Carol says she and Susan want me to be involved, but if I'm not comfortable with it, I don't have to be involved.. basically it's entirely up to me.

author: Phoebe
quote: She is so great! I miss her.

author: Monica
quote: What does she mean by 'involved'?

author: Chandler
quote: I mean presumably, the biggest part of your job is done.

author: Ross
quote: Anyway, they want me to go down to this- sonogram thing with them tomorrow.

author: Rachel
quote: So what are you gonna do?

author: Ross
quote: I have no idea. No matter what I do, though, I'm still gonna be a father.

author: Joey
quote: .....Well, this is still ruined, right?

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Oh, Martha Ludwin's daughter is gonna call you. (Tastes a snack) Mmm! What's that curry taste?

author: Monica
quote: Curry.

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Mmmm!

author: Ross
quote: I- I think they're great! I, I really do.

author: Mr. Geller
quote: (To Ross) Do you remember the Ludwins? The big one had a thing for you, didn't she?

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: They all had a thing for him.

author: Ross
quote: Aw, Mom...

author: Monica
quote: I'm sorry, why is this girl going to call me?

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Oh, she just graduated, and she wants to be something in cooking, or food, or.... I don't know. Anyway, I told her you had a restaurant-

author: Monica
quote: No Mom, I don't have a restaurant, I work in a restaurant.

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Well, they don't have to know that... (She starts to fluff the same pillow Monica fluffed multiple times earlier.)

author: Monica
quote: Ross, could you come and help me with the spaghetti, please?

author: Ross
quote: Yeah. (They go to the kitchen.)

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Oh, we're having spaghetti! That's.... easy.

author: Monica
quote: I know this is going to sound unbelievably selfish, but, were you planning on bringing up the whole baby/lesbian thing? Because I think it might take some of the heat off me.

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: What that Rachel did to her life.... We ran into her parents at the club, they were not playing very well.

author: Mr. Geller
quote: I'm not gonna tell you what they spent on that wedding... but forty thousand dollars is a lot of money!

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Well, at least she had the chance to leave a man at the altar...

author: Monica
quote: What's that supposed to mean?

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: Nothing! It's an expression.

author: Monica
quote: No it's not.

author: Mr. Geller
quote: Don't listen to your mother. You're independent, and you always have been! Even when you were a kid... and you were chubby, and you had no friends, you were just fine! And you would read alone in your room, and your puzzles...

author: Mr. Geller
quote: Look, there are people like Ross who need to shoot for the stars, with his museum, and his papers getting published. Other people are satisfied with staying where they are- I'm telling you, these are the people who never get cancer.

author: Mr. Geller
quote: ...And I read about these women trying to have it all, and I thank God 'Our Little Harmonica' doesn't seem to have that problem.

author: Monica
quote: (trying desperately to change the subject) So, Ross, what's going on with you? Any stories? (Digs her elbow into his hand.) No news, no little anecdotes to share with the folks?

author: Ross
quote: (pulls his hand away) Okay! Okay. (To his parents) Look, I, uh- I realise you guys have been wondering what exactly happened between Carol and me, and, so, well, here's the deal. Carol's a lesbian. She's living with a woman named Susan. She's pregnant with my child, and she and Susan are going to raise the baby.

author: Mrs. Geller
quote: (To Monica) And you knew about this?!

author: Joey
quote: Your folks are really that bad, huh?

author: Ross
quote: Well, y'know, these people are pros. They know what they're doing, they take their time, they get the job done.

author: Monica
quote: Boy, I know they say you can't change your parents,... boy, if you could- (To Ross) -I'd want yours.

author: Ross
quote: Must pee. (Goes to pee.)

author: Phoebe
quote: Y'know, it's even worse when you're twins.

author: Rachel
quote: You're twins?

author: Phoebe
quote: Yeah. We don't speak. She's like this high-powered, driven career type.

author: Chandler
quote: What does she do?

author: Phoebe
quote: She's a waitress.

author: Rachel
quote: All right, you guys, I kinda gotta clean up now. (They all start to leave.)

author: Monica
quote: Chandler, you're an only child, right? You don't have any of this.

author: Chandler
quote: Well, no, although I did have an imaginary friend, who... my parents actually preferred.

author: Rachel
quote: The lights, please..

author: Ross
quote: ...How long was I in there?

author: Rachel
quote: I'm just cleaning up.

author: Ross
quote: D'ya.. uh.. d'ya need any help?

author: Rachel
quote: Uh.. okay, sure! Thanks! (She hands him the broom and sits down.)

author: Ross
quote: Anyway.. um.. (Starts to sweep.) So, you- uh- you nervous about Barry tomorrow?

author: Rachel
quote: Oh.. a little..

author: Ross
quote: Mm-hmm..

author: Rachel
quote: A lot.

author: Ross
quote: Mm.

author: Rachel
quote: So, got any advice? Y'know, as someone who's recently been- dumped?

author: Ross
quote: Well, you may wanna steer clear of the word 'dumped'. Chances are he's gonna be this, this broken shell of a man, y'know, so you should try not to look too terrific, I know it'll be hard. Or, y'know, uh, hey!, I'll go down there, and I'll give Barry back his ring, and you can go with Carol and Susan to the OB/GYN...

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, you've got Carol tomorrow.. When did it get so complicated?

author: Ross
quote: Got me.

author: Rachel
quote: Remember when we were in high school together?

author: Ross
quote: Yeah.

author: Rachel
quote: I mean, didn't you think you were just gonna meet somone, fall in love- and that'd be it? (Ross gazes at her.) ..Ross?

author: Ross
quote: Yes, yes!

author: Rachel
quote: Oh! Man, I never thought I'd be here.. (She leans back onto his hand.)

author: Ross
quote: Me either... (He pulls up a stool so that he doesn't have to move his hand.)

author: Ross
quote: (entering) Sorry I'm late, I was stuck at work. There was this big dinosaur.. thing.. anyway.

author: Susan
quote: Hi.

author: Carol
quote: Ross, you remember Susan.

author: Ross
quote: How could I forget?

author: Susan
quote: Ross.

author: Ross
quote: (they shake hands) Hello, Susan. (To Carol) Good shake. Good shake. So, uh, we're just waiting for...?

author: Carol
quote: Dr. Oberman.

author: Ross
quote: ..Dr. Oberman. Okay. And is he-

author: Susan
quote: She.

author: Ross
quote: -she, of course, she- uh- familiar with our.. special situation?

author: Carol
quote: Yes, and she's very supportive.

author: Ross
quote: Okay, that's great. (Susan gives her drink to Carol.) No, I'm- Oh.

author: Carol
quote: Thanks.

author: Ross
quote: (picks up a surgical instrament and mimes a duck with it) Quack, quack..

author: Carol
quote: Ross? That opens my cervix. (He drops it in horror.)

author: Rachel
quote: Barry?

author: Barry
quote: C'mon in.

author: Rachel
quote: (hesitates) Are you sure?

author: Barry
quote: Yeah! It's fine, it's fine. Robbie's gonna be here for hours.

author: Robbie
quote: Huh?!

author: Barry
quote: So, how ya doin?

author: Rachel
quote: I'm- uh- I'm okay... You look great!

author: Barry
quote: Yeah, well..

author: Bernice
quote: (over intercom) Dr. Farber, Jason Greenstein's gagging.

author: Barry
quote: (answering the intercom) Be right there. (To Robbie and Rachel) Be back in a sec.

author: Rachel
quote: I dumped him.

author: Robbie
quote: Okay.

author: Ross
quote: So, um- so how's this, uh, how's this gonna work? Y'know, with us? Y'know, when, like, important decisions have to be made?

author: Carol
quote: Give me a 'for instance'.

author: Ross
quote: Well, uh, uh, I don't know, okay, okay, how about with the, uh, with the baby's name?

author: Carol
quote: Marlon-

author: Ross
quote: Marlon?!

author: Carol
quote: -if it's a boy, Minnie if it's a girl.

author: Ross
quote: ...As in Mouse?

author: Carol
quote: As in my grandmother.

author: Ross
quote: Still, you- you say Minnie, you hear Mouse. Um, how about, um.. how about Julia?

author: Carol
quote: Julia..

author: Susan
quote: We agreed on Minnie.

author: Ross
quote: 'S'funny, um, uh, we agreed we'd spend the rest of our lives together. Things change, roll with the punches. I believe Julia's on the table..?

author: Barry
quote: Sorry about that. So. What have you been up to?

author: Rachel
quote: Oh, not much. I-I got a job.

author: Barry
quote: Oh, that's great.

author: Rachel
quote: Why are- why are you so tanned?

author: Barry
quote: Oh, I, uh- I went to Aruba.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh no. You went on our honeymoon alone?

author: Barry
quote: No. I went with, uh.. Now, this may hurt.

author: Robbie
quote: Me?!

author: Barry
quote: No! (To Rachel) I went with Mindy.

author: Rachel
quote: Mindy?! My maid of honour, Mindy?!

author: Barry
quote: Yeah, well, uh, we're kind of a thing now.

author: Rachel
quote: Oh! Well, um.. (Grabs his forehand) You've got plugs!

author: Barry
quote: Careful! They haven't quite taken yet.

author: Rachel
quote: And you've got lenses! But you hate sticking your finger in your eye!

author: Barry
quote: Not for her. Listen, I really wanted to thank you.

author: Rachel
quote: Okay..

author: Barry
quote: See, about a month ago, I wanted to hurt you. More than I've ever wanted to hurt anyone in my life. And I'm an orthodontist.

author: Rachel
quote: Wow.

author: Barry
quote: You know, you were right? I mean, I thought we were happy. We weren't happy. But with Mindy, now I'm happy. Spit.

author: Rachel
quote: What?

author: Robbie
quote: Me. (Spits.)

author: Rachel
quote: Anyway, um, (Gets the ring out of her purse.) I guess this belongs to you. And thank you for giving it to me.

author: Barry
quote: Well, thank you for giving it back.

author: Robbie
quote: Hello?!

author: Susan
quote: Oh, please! What's wrong with Helen?

author: Ross
quote: Helen Geller? I don't think so.

author: Carol
quote: Hello? It's not gonna be Helen Geller.

author: Ross
quote: Thank you!

author: Carol
quote: No, I mean it's not Geller.

author: Ross
quote: What, it's gonna be Helen Willick?

author: Carol
quote: No, actually, um, we talked about Helen Willick-Bunch.

author: Ross
quote: Well, wait a minute, wha- why is she in the title?

author: Susan
quote: It's my baby too.

author: Ross
quote: Oh, 's'funny, really? Um, I don't remember you making any sperm.

author: Susan
quote: Yeah, and we all know what a challenge that is!

author: Carol
quote: All right, you two, stop it!

author: Ross
quote: No no no, she gets a credit, hey, I'm in there too.

author: Carol
quote: Ross. You're not actually suggesting Helen Willick-Bunch-Geller? 'Cause I think that borders on child abuse.

author: Ross
quote: Of course not, I'm... suggesting Geller-Willick-Bunch.

author: Susan
quote: Oh, no, nonononono, you see what he's doing? He knows no-one's gonna say all those names, so they'll wind up calling her Geller, then he gets his way!

author: Ross
quote: My way?! You-you think this is my way? Believe me, of all the ways I ever imagined this moment in my life being, this is not my way- y'know what? Uh, um, this is too hard. I'm not, I can't do-

author: Dr. Oberman
quote: (entering) Knock knock!How are we today? Any nausea?

author: All
quote: Yeah. Yeah. A little.

author: Dr. Oberman
quote: Well, I was just wondering about the mother-to-be, but.. thanks for sharing. (To Carol) Uh, lie back..

author: Ross
quote: You- uh- y'know what, I'm gonna go. I don't- I don't think I can be involved in this particular thing right now.

author: Ross
quote: Oh my God.

author: Susan
quote: Look at that.

author: Carol
quote: I know.

author: Ross
quote: Well? Isn't that amazing?

author: Joey
quote: What are we supposed to be seeing here?

author: Chandler
quote: I dunno, but.. I think it's about to attack the Enterprise.

author: Phoebe
quote: You know, if you tilt your head to the left, and relax your eyes, it kinda looks like an old potato.

author: Ross
quote: Then don't do that, alright?

author: Phoebe
quote: Okay!

author: Ross
quote: (walks over to where Monica is standing)Monica. Whaddya think?

author: Monica
quote: (welling up) Mm-hmm.

author: Ross
quote: Wh- are you welling up?

author: Monica
quote: No.

author: Ross
quote: You are, you're welling up.

author: Monica
quote: Am not!

author: Ross
quote: You're gonna be an aunt.

author: Monica
quote: (pushes him and starts to cry) Oh shut up!

author: Rachel
quote: (on phone) Hi, Mindy. Hi, it-it's Rachel. Yeah, I'm fine. I-I saw Barry today. Oh, yeah, yeah he-he told me. No, no, it's okay. I hope you two are very happy, I really do. Oh, oh, and Mind, y'know, if-if everything works out, and you guys end up getting married and having kids- and everything- I just hope they have his old hairline and your old nose. (Slams the phone down.) (To everyone) Okay, I know it was a cheap shot, but I feel so much better now.
